title: **SOLD**: Mayo Russie - very nice card in SGC 'AUTH'
author: Runscott

posts.post_title: **SOLD**: Mayo Russie - very nice card in SGC 'AUTH'
posts.post_content:
Looking to trade the following, but also available at a firm price of $1,025 via Paypal gift, money order or personal check.  Primarily interested in big-name caramel HOF'ers (any E95 or E96 HOFer, sort of interested in E93, E98, or any Wagner, Cobb, Lajoie or Matty color caramel, some E90-1s such as Keeler and Young).  Also looking for T206 HOF portraits in VGEX or better, or tough variations.  Thanks! 

Please send emails to lessdrama at gmail.com.  

(left-click image to see huge scan)

The Russie was graded 'Authentic' (according to Legendary) due to back-coloring.  Other than that, it looks amazing - very clear picture for a Mayo.

(The T206 Murphy has been sold)

[URL="http://www.t206themonster.com/Cards/FORSALE/SMayo-Russie.jpeg"][IMG]http://www.t206themonster.com/Cards/FORSALE/SMayo-RussieMed.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Scott, like the Amos you prefer trade or cash?

Scott your PM box is full. I'll take the card.

John

[quote name="wonkaticket" post=951580]Scott your PM box is full. I'll take the card.

John[/QUOTE]

Okay, it's yours.  Please use my email address, listed in the first post.
